name: A Vikings journey to Valhalla
description:
You're a Viking trying to get to Valhalla.
The best way to get to Valhalla is by dying... a lot!
Like most platformers, enemies and spikes kill you on touch, so try not to avoid them as every death makes you harder better faster stronger ;)

Controls:

rightD or right arrowkeyleft A or left arrowkeyjump W or up arrowkey or spacebar

I startet on learning how to make games in Godot on the friday Jonas announced the theme for this gamejam. Before that I never had even thought about making games so except for programming, image- and sound editing I had to learn everything on how to make games from scratch, which of course makes this game far from what I would consider good. I'll probably add more stuff like more and smarter enemies/more levels/more variety in traps/general improvements once I learn how to do that stuff.
Thanks for reading :)
